channel.title: Let's Play
channel.description:
Hey I just uploaded my first episode of my Black Mesa play-through check it out :smiley: I plan to do a full play-through of this and support would be much appreciated, so if you could like, comment or subscribe that would mean a lot to me :smiley:
Link [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q_0ChEO3ees&feature=plcp[/url]
Thank you
